titleStmt.title: A co[m]parison betwene the olde learnynge [and] the newe translated out of latin in Englysh by Wylliam Turner.
titleStmt.author: Rhegius, Urbanus, 1489-1541.
Turner, William, d. 1568.

notesStmt.note: A translation of Urbanus Rhegius's 'Novae doctrinae ad veterem collatio'.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
